article_title: Viacom Forms Programming Group for its Networks
article_text:
Viacom Inc. said it is forming a group to coordinate program acquisitions for its U.S. networks, looking to strike stronger deals to air shows from other entertainment companies on its various networks.

Viacom's focus is largely on original programming, which typically refers to shows developed in-house with the company's external producers....
